recipesJson.name: Red Mistaire - Red Astaire Remix
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a remix of Red Astaire from T-Juice using my Misty One-Shot and CAP Cool Anise Bliss. Sweet, sticky, red berries with light anise and cooling. Truly an excellent and easy ADV for anyone who enjoys Red Astaire. 

Made on:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KBsVNfzuyp4
